Bits, Pixels and Atoms Random tech musing by Sricharan Chiruvolu

About

Hello.

I am Sricharan Chiruvolu. I am an open-source believer, web developer and a graphics programmer. I am currently pursuing my CS undergrad from Amrita School of Engineering, Bengaluru, India.

I am passionate about computer science. Love to read manga and watch anime and enjoy sitcoms in my free time.

I am also a student developer for Copyleft Games, in association with Google Inc., under Google Summer of Code, 2015.
